text: The ad says the rent would be 840 dollars per month . Is it true ?
translated: 광고에 임대료가 한 달에 840달러라고 하던데, 사실인가요?

text: It leaves at 9:30 a . m ..
translated: 오전 9시 30분에 출발합니다..

text: Thanks . Was there a mina bar in the room ?

translated: 당신은 아내와 함께 발렌타인 데이를 어떻게 기념하나요?

text: Calm down !

text: The meter reads 9.15 dollars .

text: Okay . Sounds good . See you then .

text: One bottle of perfume and a watch .

text: Yes , please . That is very kind of you .
translated: 네. 정말 친절하시군요.

text: How much money do you want to transfer ?
